I

ICell - Interface in model.cell
ICell defines the interface required by MineField for a Cell.
ICellState - Interface in model.cell
Interface for a class describing the state of a cell.
ICellView - Interface in view
ICellView defines the interface required by MineFinderController for a CellView
ICellViewController - Interface in view
ICellViewController defines the interface required for a controller, in order for the CellView to update the controller of user input
IGameTimer - Interface in controller.timer
IGameTimer defines the interface required by MineFinderController for a timer
IHeaderController - Interface in view
IHeaderController defines the interface required for a controller, in order for the Header to update the controller of user input
IMenuController - Interface in view
IMenuController defines the interface required for a controller, in order for the Menu to update the controller of user input
IMineField - Interface in model
IMineField defines the interface required by MineFinderController for a MineField

decrements time by one

indexAt(int, int) - Method in class model.MineField
Returns the index of a cell in the arraylist, given its row and column in the grid

Returns the index of an ICell in the minefield
indexOfCell(ICell) - Method in class model.MineField
Returns the index of a given ICell in the minefield
initialize() - Method in class controller.MineFinderController
Sets the game controller for the Header and Menu.
initializeView() - Method in class controller.MineFinderController
Creates the minefield based on the size and difficulty.
initialTime - Variable in class controller.timer.CountdownTimer
The amount of time given to solve a board of particular size and difficulty
